content: Hi, for insurance billing, I need to store in some way the pricing associated with CPT codes. can anyone point me in the right direction? Thanks
@Simone Heckmann this is right isn't it?

@Yassiel Oliva Did you mean in the Claim itself, that would be in Claim.item.unitPrice and .net where the CPT code would be in Claim.item.productOrService. If you are looking for somewhere to persist or express a pricelist then the guidance in prior comments applies.
